name: pikanium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows pikachu to upgrade volt tackle into catastropika.
short_effect: Held: Allows Pikachu to upgrade Volt Tackle into Catastropika.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Pikachu’s Volt Tackle to a Z-Move.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Pikachu’s Volt Tackle to a Z-Move.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Pikachu’s Volt Tackle to a Z-Move.
